items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any team member, all other members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are synchronized across web and mobile platforms without requiring manual refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support at least 100 concurrent active users without performance degradation.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to communicate about tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within project-specific chat rooms.
Chat history is stored and retrievable for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Messages must be delivered within 1 second under normal network conditions.
Chat feature must be available 99.9% of the time.

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core collaboration features include real-time task updates and integrated chat. Further clarification needed on additional features like file sharing, notifications, or role-based permissions.
